column4: hi how can i upgrade the kernel?... i've got the 2.6.24-16 an i need the 2.6.24-19... i'm new on linux
hi how can i upgrade the kernel?... i've got the 2.6.24-16 an i need the 2.6.24-19... i'm a newbie

go to system > administration > software sources > click updates and make sure all 4 boxes on the top are checked. hit close, you should reload the channels or whatever, go to terminal, type in sudo update-manager -d
